Mpabwa Sarah Patience (amụrụ n'abalị isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ otu puku narị itoolu iri isii na isii) bụ onye nnọchi anya ndị agha nchekwa ndị Uganda (UPDF) na onye omeiwu na nke itoolu nke Uganda.

Ọ bụ onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke UPDF na nke itoolu.  Ndị omeiwu UPDF ndị ọzọ a họpụtara na Nzukọ nke itoolu gụnyere Edward Katumba Wamala, Elly Tumwine Tuhirirwe, David Sejusa, onye nwụrụ anwụ Robert Aronda Nyakairima, Charles Angina, Jim Oweyeigire, Julius Oketta Facki, Brigadier Phinehas Manoni Katirima, na Susan Lakot.
